\u03bf\u1f30\u03ba\u03ad\u03c4\u03b7\u03: Hmm...why are some of these marked as "masculine" when they seem to have feminine endings?
\u03bd\u03bf\u03c5\u03bd\u03b5\u03c7\u1f: See http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nous for an overview of the distinction between sophia as "theoretical wisdom" (which includes nous and episteme) and phronesis as "practical wisdom".
